description.value: The character can spend a Fate Point to make a +0 Ballistic Skill Test as a Full Action. If they succeed, they choose a single target within range, that unit is marked for one round, +1 per Degree of Success on test. Allied Tau characters that hit the target with ranged attacks can roll twice for damage and choose the higher result.
